jdbcService.sql: select distinct tim.trace_instance_id, ti.started, ti.stopped from ~trace_instance_messages tim join ~trace_instances ti on tim.trace_instance_id = ti.id where tim.trace_type='REPORT' and tim.sub_type='be.nabu.eai.module.tracer.TraceReportString' and tim.audience='business' and lower(report) like '%' || lower(:q) || '%' and (:after is null or ti.started >= :after) and (:before is null or ti.stopped < :before) and ti.trace_service_id = :traceServiceId
